statements: DELETE FROM user_fitness_data WHERE user_id = 3 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM user_fitness_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM user_fitness_data WHERE weight <= 70.50 AND height >= 160.00
DELETE FROM user_fitness_data WHERE activity_level = 'active' AND target_calories > 2000
DELETE FROM User WHERE age > 50 AND weight <= 70;
DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE goal = 'Weight Loss' AND fitness_level = 'Intermediate';
DELETE FROM fitness_activities WHERE duration_min > 60 AND calories_burned < 500
DELETE FROM users WHERE age < 18 OR (height > 160 AND weight > 70)
DELETE FROM activities WHERE activity_name = 'Running' AND duration_minutes > 30
DELETE FROM meals WHERE calories > 500 AND protein < 20
DELETE FROM workouts WHERE intensity_level = 'High' AND duration_minutes >= 60
